column1: # Example mixed-OS target list for Invoke-ForensicCollector
# - UserName: optional SSH username override (empty means no override)
# - KeyFilePath: optional SSH key path override (empty means no override)
# - For SSH targets you must run from PowerShell 7+ and provide -UserName and -KeyFilePath when invoking.

column2: the tool uses OS to decide (Windows=WinRM
